title: Do You Know God Made You?
description: A Personalized Book Kit about how special YOU are to God. He created you just the way you are - from your hair color to your giggle. He made you to enjoy those toys you love and have fun with your friends. He placed you into your family, and He even gave you the most special gift of all: Jesus.With spaces to enter your child's name, eye color, hair color, and photographs; he/she will enjoy learning how much God loves him/her personally! "Do you know... God made you?" will help your child begin to understand the reality of a unique relationship with the Heavenly Father. Includes two (2) sheets of printable photo paper for laser and ink jet printers. Sheets have a sticky back to adhere to the pages for personalization.
author: Karen Deming
